body_html:
I closed this pr and split it - too many things in it. I think I'll split it in 4 prs:

  1. the memory corruption (addressed your review comments and send a new pr #5288)
  2. enable sparse mat ops (nearly done)
  3. enable immutable ops
  4. enable debug_op
    I'll make sure sure they are on top of the meta_support.* changes
    Hope that works.

body:
I closed this pr and split it - too many things in it. I think I'll split it in 4 prs:
1. the memory corruption (addressed your review comments and send a new pr  #5288)
2. enable sparse mat ops (nearly done)
3. enable immutable ops
4. enable debug_op 
I'll make sure sure they are on top of the meta_support.\* changes 
Hope that works.
